caption.p: Comparative analysis of serum cytokine production in tocilizumab-treated versus patients that received Tac/MTX only. Concentration of IL-6, sIL-6R, IL-2, IL-4, IL-10, IL-17, IFN-γ, and TNF-α in the serum of patients that were treated with Toc/Tac/MTX (●, n=35) or Tac/MTX (control) (○, n=11) for the prevention of aGvHD prior to the start of conditioning and at days 7, 14 and 28. * P<0.05, ** P<0.01, *** P<0.001. IL: interleukin; sIL: soluble interleukin; TNF-α: tumor necrosis factor α; IFN-γ: interferon γ.
